actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to change the names of a dam and reservoir on the Salt River, Missouri, from the "Clarence Cannon Dam and Reservoir" to the "Clarence Cannon Dam and Mark Twain Lake."

summary.text: Changes the name of the Clarence Cannon Dam and Reservoir on the Salt River, Missouri, to the Clarence Cannon Dam and Mark Twain Lake.

titles.title: A bill to change the names of a dam and reservoir on the Salt River, Missouri, from the "Clarence Cannon Dam and Reservoir" to the "Clarence Cannon Dam and Mark Twain Lake."
